textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Oof.. That thing really did a number on me..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: If it's ever gonna wake up..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Hey hey.. Everything is alright now. You’re safe.. Relax.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Well I'm not surprised. You got messed up badly.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I’m more surprised that you actually woke up with bare bones first aid.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: And the fact that your flower is still perfectly intact.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Don’t worry! I made sure it was safe as well.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: ...That sure got a reaction out of you.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: When I found you, you were curled around that lily.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: So whatever you were protecting it from.. You sure did.. And really well at that!

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Considering your.. Physical state and all..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Uhm... Does it mean something to you?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Relax. Keep your eyes open, follow my finger.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Your name. The thing people call you when they need your attention..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: And also barely following my finger...

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Where we are? What attacked you?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: “Finding” is a very delicate word. It was more like.. Noticing.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: (Is this supposed to be some form of purgatory..?)

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Well you need a name and I'm not calling you “Flower Keeper”.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I don’t know.. You look like one.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: How do I look like a “Zayn”?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Look I'm not good with naming things so just.. Your name is Zayn, questions later.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: The name’s Nora. The “u” is silent.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I would recommend us not staying here for any longer than we need to.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: It’s getting dark, and you do not remember what attacked you, and I’m not about to fuck around and find out.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: So let’s visit a city.. Or village.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: ...Are you coming or do you need help getting up?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Good enough.. I just need to rest..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Don’t know where to put your lily?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I don’t want to hurt it..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I clipped it to your hair. Looks good.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Nice. Let’s get somewhere safe then.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Ah, see! I told you we would find something.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: You changed directions 3 times since then…

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: And it perfectly led us here.. to.. this..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Sort of.. Headache just got a bit worse..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Well then let's hope for some fluffy beds.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: ...I’d really dig some fluffy beds right about now..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: ..Why would you want to dig into a bed?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: It’s.. It’s like.. How do I even start this..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Am I not understanding something obvious?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Well sort of.. It’s just a different way of saying “I would really like that”.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: ...What does that have to do with digging?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: We would like to stay here for a night or two.

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: Oho? What brings 2 fine ladies like yourselves to such a remote village like this at night?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Already did, you got no indicators.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: N-no like.. in terms of what you areee..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Soo, we would like a room

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: ....ah- Of course. Though we only got one left..

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: ..a-ah, ma’am! This is 7 Ignaz too mu-

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: See it as a bribe for silence...

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Uh.. Did I say something wrong?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Oh no.. Is this how she must have felt?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I- I think we both need some rest badly..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Not much.. If anything I’m more confused…

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: It’s a logbook. Heard it might help to write things down if you have troubles dealing with some things mentally.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: And you’re giving it to me?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Sure, why not. I prefere audio anyway.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Just, try to write things down whenever you feel like it..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Anyway, Imma hit the sack. Goodnight.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (She doesn’t seem to be hitting anything..)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (Hm? Why is there an “L” written into the logbook?)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (Hm.. I’ll ask her about it tomorrow..)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (There.. I should probably get some rest as well.)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (She's probably also really tired.. Better let her rest then.)
